task.title: How to Use a Publishing Template in the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS (WYSIWYG) Transformation

titlealts.navtitle: In the DITA Map PDF - based on DITA & CSS (WYSIWYG) Transformation

taskbody.context: Once you have created a customization, you can use it from the transformation scenario, by using a parameter that points to the customization template descriptor file.

step.cmd: Open the transformation dialog, seelct your scenario and press Edit.
Add a parameter with the name: pdf.publishing.template and the value the full path to the template descriptor .opt file (you can use the browse button).
